```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r loadlibraries}
#load necessary libraries
library(plyr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(reshape2)
library(ggthemes)
```

```{r importdata}
ash <- read.csv('ASH_deltaFoverFmax.csv')
meltedash <- melt(ash)
summaryash <- ddply(meltedash,.(variable),summarize,mean=mean(value),N=length(value),sd=sd(value),sem=sd/sqrt(N))
```

```{r plot}
ggplot(meltedash,aes(x=variable,y=value)) + geom_jitter(alpha=0.5,width=0,height=0) + geom_point(data=summaryash,aes(x=variable,y=mean),shape='+') + geom_point(data=summaryash,aes(x=variable,y=mean+sem),shape='-')+ geom_point(data=summaryash,aes(x=variable,y=mean-sem),shape='-')+ theme_tufte() + geom_hline(yintercept=0) + geom_segment(data=ash,aes(x='ethanol',xend='deet',y=ethanol,yend=deet))
```


```{r stats}
t.test(ash$ethanol,ash$deet,paired=TRUE)
```
